_sText:
You are in a house. There has been a criminal organisation that used to stay there. They were robbing banks and left all the money in the house also some of their equipment.

One day they all disappeared. Something happened but nobody will ever seek the truth inside the house.

It has 1 room where they kept their money 2 bombsites, 1 in the boss office and 1 in their planing room.

A Kitchen (way to big kitchen though) Toilet A room where they studied generators

This map is still in beta release. All creds goes to Xgjengen for creating the map. He did it all by himself but he has still not learned hammer completely. You can find him on youtube

////////////////////////////////FROM V2 TO V3 NOTES////////////////////////////////////////// > Toilet is now totally changed from what i really was
> Bombzone number 1 has now the flat tvs into the wall
> Little tweaks 
> Machinery room now looks better

It would be nice if someone soon could run a server within this map. Feel free to comment if you have the map running on a server !

//////////////////////////////////////INSTALLATION/////////////////////////////////////////// Extract the darkhousev3.rar with winrar into your Steam/Steamapps/Yourname/Counter strike source/cstrike/maps folder

//////////////////////////////////////CONTACT/////////////////////////////////////////////////

Any suggestions or getting permission to edit map please send an email to xgjengen.

Snasken360@hotmail.com or xgjengen@hotmail.com

Enjoy and have fun!
